entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
